entity.name: name
entity.query: SELECT id, name FROM solr_names_core_vw WHERE state = 'ACTIVE'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT id, name FROM solr_names_core_vw WHERE id = '${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM solr_names_core_vw WHERE state = 'ACTIVE' AND last_modified > TO_TIMESTAMP('${dih.last_index_time}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
entity.deletedPkQuery: SELECT id FROM solr_names_core_vw WHERE state = 'INACTIVE' AND last_modified > TO_TIMESTAMP('${dih.last_index_time}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
